title: Studio Apartment - Ideal Location Near Northwestern & Magnificent Mile
posting_body: Amazing studio available within easy walking distance Northwestern Medicine, Northwestern Law, and Magnificent Mile.
High ceilings, large windows, stainless steel fixtures.
Building includes a gym, rooftop deck, 24 hour desk service, and is pet friendly.
This is a lease assignment available as early as August 15 through September 23 with the option to re-sign for another term after September 23.
Landlord may offer flexible lease terms.
Rent is $1335, with an additional ~$90 per month in utilities.
The building may offer a $125 parking voucher with proof of payment for parking deducted from your rent (at building management's discretion).
Possible option to purchase some of the furniture currently in the unit.
You will not find an apartment in this area for this price!
Please contact me for a video and additional information.
